item.title: 英国制裁以色列部长加沙评论-BBC
item.description: 英国制裁以色列部长加沙评论＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bbc smotrich发誓新的定居点，本gvir表示'temp视'英国以批准他们＆nbsp; nbsp; 以色列时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijwfbvv95cuxpouhumvawcfhzv3cztjd1b1b1owy3ctthrkcejwmdnvvdnvvdnhnhnhnhnhnhjvrofk4v KTPQI1WAERQUM1JNHFOQWHHHUEVPRC0YT19WYW1LYMLMCJE2SGPJMZRKB1BEU3RO3ROB1BEU3ROQXF6UFC0ELBUEDVWVWVS1HYNVHSNZ5QTFPPX0ZUWKHOAWTZA3Z3Z3Z3Z3Z3Z3Z3Z3Z3Z 19HzTBSVU5BU2FOVDIBLAFBV95CUXPREJMSKPAUU1ATVC3ZWZPVHLWM1Y5BG9QUVOYQULBEMUXYK1QVJL4R2XANEVEBKRWWWVC5WUDKYNBPZLPHWW exyeuyzwml0nxlqavfaz3bvy25iwvhgbnz5bg4xovvyngu1ml92vhpsturkz0exdflrcuxlcuxlcuxlnmpqoxpfpsfpsfpisfpisfpisfpisfpisfpsfk5qymvrddidi1zf8yq19x？ target =“ _ blank”>英国制裁两名以色列政府部长＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn 英国对制裁ben-gvir，smotrich over'可怕的加沙评论＆nbsp; nbsp; 耶路撒冷邮报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmipafbvv95cuxqa1fwzuh0ndqyellxd2znqy1hmvr0as1hmvr0as1yenvrs ands1yenenvrs Q4NHJkRUxjclQ2YVo3QzJVdTgwcXNfR3I3OE93enhKNTlYcUFtYU9BMzktem04Q3ozVHRfTG4zOVZ3cmQ0bXgyOFkyckFGSFRzSjVqU1dETnozd0VWZGlUUU5qM3Z5SVY5dw?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>英国和加拿大设定批准极右翼以色列内阁部长＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报

item.title: 加沙船占领后，格雷塔·敦伯格（Greta Thunberg）从以色列驱逐出境 - 路透社

item.title: 巴勒斯坦人说，当地的枪手和以色列部队在加沙援助站点附近开火-BBC
item.description: 巴勒斯坦人说，当地的枪手和以色列部队在加沙援助站点附近开火＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc bbc 以色列枪声在加沙援助站点附近杀死17人，卫生官员说＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmimwjbvv95cuxodwficdboeho2sffunhg1cjlntnjnjnjnjnjnog9wuhzorkkkorkkkkkorkkkwkrjvkodrnm W1UTGLJEU4WAEO3MG13THO2ZFPWWWJB6V3QZUFFZUXPBBBTH1TG5IRGTKZELZS3JGAUW3MVJYVGJYVGN0Z05GIYZ05GIYZHNWTFHTFHLEFHLEFP4WFRP4WFR0X1JQSJQSJFIR vpwzulqww8wntnxndvuvmbnrky2O2DG0YR29EDTZ6TLLEOWV1AWHWENRAMWLDWEPPU2PMBBBEXKNJETRNFKETRNFKETRFKETRFKETRFWGVNZUL1DWM3BXFRR1H1S llltlnxngpdbkexr0j3evrteg1wdkfnyvpwmxfxbvggwgwv3hua2hwevgbmnkmnkodlgujdpcdpcdvmjcchzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz djvtgkemriwhj3wutlsuzr？ target =“ _ blank”>报告：17在加沙食品分销地点附近被以色列大火杀死＆nbsp;＆nbsp; haaretz href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMivwFBVV95cUxNV0V5NG1RejQwOHNyaEZrcWZSazB4LWlELWFtSkJUZHdQYjZ4ZDlwaEpJcTJhMi15ZVAxNmJ6bnB0MHhRc2xHT JZWOTY2NXVJBM1NMVH5QVBQCJLQCWJNZZQ2WLLLWVPTSE9KANRTD2ZQSNBQQKJKJ4X2VJDXBQS 3ZGEWFHOEPTA3PTZWZQWJZEWUHRTDFYCVZPQ0C0C0C0CJPZUHTSLBNQTJDCHJDCHJRYLPYUTNLZ0T22M 1BGBL9WZFL2S0GZY9IBXAFBV95CUXPELLJQ1LGBJNCBFF5NTBFSG1FAZNQDKVBRNG1OGVGN lrfnvfnmgtmsktmuhdrtxvhv09ltvi4te9fvza0nzh6slddckl2zwjjagfssmhfnw9kz0xym WHFQXD2ZVUYV2FBSXNRZDJTA05YB0NQWMLTU1KWBJLHANBUAFJZSLQ4RMFZBDZBDZ1V3B4ZUS0R VZ2SZB0BK9ROHN4OEN0WLRYD1P0WEZJEXU5YxFUVU1PQK84OGHMMDU3B0LPBFRMZUHK？oc = 5“ target =“ _空白”>以色列枪声再次针对援助配送中心附近的巴勒斯坦人＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera 巴勒斯坦人说，以色列及其盟友在加沙援助站点附近的人群中开火。医院说14人被杀＆nbsp;＆nbsp; AP News

item.title: 梅洛尼（Meloni）的联盟嘲讽从海滩留下，当时选民投票率少数公投 - politico.eu
item.description: 梅洛尼（Meloni）的联盟嘲讽在海滩上留下了低落的选民投票率公投， ＆nbsp; politico.eu.eu <a a <a a <a a <a a <a a <a a a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiuAFBVV95cUxObTZGVEhQMm5EUTMtbmY3QlBzZkFIaThsejV1T3hwT1V1eC12YlhMMy0xR000ZjZwT2lTNVQ3dHlhVnBoSkhfNmNCeXV TEVKWELL0YXOXSFJJU2T0AZITBFVFVKNNMEW4TUVZLWNMSGVDVDV0FLMEG5ZGPRAUDWSEHUZLB1TU yzwgtvvtbfthntsnlivxa1avpkdhllujn6etnccmzavekzbvvdogc4undzkxfzbfrky3bm？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>意大利的全民公决flop bolsters meloni，揭示了公民身份左图＆nbsp; nbsp; 谁成为意大利人？选民面临选择。＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 纽约时报 意大利公民公民投票在低投票率之后＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bbc 意大利的公民公民投票在选民注意乔治·梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）呼吁抵制＆nbsp; ft.com </ft.com </font.

item.title: 劳动希望将冬季燃料失误抛在身后-BBC
item.description: 是指每年以35,000英镑的应税收入来测试冬季燃油支付 - 对贫困水平的影响＆nbsp; nbsp; gov.uk href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte9hulnmzwjit0jwcgdxrvlknwthufk1 mlh4odi3nepjwjzyoef2r0fyyug5wwtmrudscff0tbfb0q1mvawt0ctdw5hhyjc0vlvqzxfvednhsk90zw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>'这是燃料的'和'140亿英镑的核'＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bbc 守护者对工人的艰难选择的看法：他们正在付出极大的代价|社论＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 监护人 500,000更多的养老金领取者，有损失冬季燃料支付在劳动下＆nbsp; nbsp; nbsp; 的风险

item.title: 随着特朗普的新旅行禁令开始，一些游客在美国机场报告了额外的审查-PBS
item.description: 特朗普的旅行禁令现已生效。这是要知道的＆nbsp;＆nbsp; npr 美国人成长麻木了吗？特朗普的新旅行禁令遇到了柔和的反应＆nbsp; msnbc新闻 限制外国国民的进入，以保护美国免受外国恐怖分子以及其他国家安全和公共安全威胁 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmix0fvx3lxte9fawfadw1kngu4vehvs2r4 T1A3SLPZVXDHCHVIAZZ2S280LXJVAEHROHDHSGPHMHQTCFU5B2Q4BFJUX1RXQKXMDUSTWHDCVFU3ZXG1 UMLSENKWWELORL9N0GFKQVVFEXFMUEXTOUXFMUJNLWXMTXFTQKPWD2T5C1PMBDJUAUHLNETZY05LYWLNUFN2 UMTCX3H2RHNFC1G5WC1MMWJZCUJIUGDUZXZ6RC1ZNGTXR0H2ZUZ4RM9DEWTOWVU4WNF4BK5CNG？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普的新旅行禁令随着紧张局势在移民执法上升级而生效＆nbsp; cnn

item.title: 国际原子能机构首席接力伊朗警告以色列对核设施的罢工 - 路透社
item.description: IAEA首席继电器伊朗警告以色列在核设施上罢工＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmingfbvv95cuxnneyjdzeo3wnneyxvwvffn4s0nkqlbsy0zkmw90qzkmw90qzldowfuem5unxpmtlo0cnhtlo0cnhts2jheuniaiaiaiaiaiaiaia1uzlx jzve1erhlxodrhrezmbffdtdrqbhlszejibndnuxlhsmzzvmzbt2j2vhljvhljvhljvv9ivv9ivmnwytrpdfffwbudia3jucgdcnno3jucxzzzzzzdlbllrchpyblrchpysgzycgzyc2h0whn qufyt oc oc target =“ _ blank”>在关键委员会投票之前，国际原子能机构对伊朗核计划的检查有什么了解href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmisgfbvv95cuxqmmmvnbfetzwnlwevndmlmqvfpddblvpdblvww8yamrihya3zwr3zwr3 ddfvkh6ndlr2fvkh6nn0x5yn0x5ykn1q01q01 qukn1 qukn1qkn1 qukn1 qukn1 qukn1 qukn1 qukk1 alck1 alckn1 fack VFJ5N0lTNXBCakNESkFEU0VTV2ZqRDdwRVpCMVJsa2hsUFIxTGF1LTVGNC1ncUJGblBST09ITS1pRWxGbTFYUWJqbXJUNENIdzNaeWlqRVg0NDhhUWlzX0lqUThRNUNUWldEcm5M S0JYDTLMEKZAV1JB0GG3AUFVX3LXTE0WWK13DULSQNVGD2WXD0HOCTJRICTJRYURPBG9IVHBS zw4xrwltnfdzejlaz0vnumrpzwzfmmwxvdkwn01lwdbfc2heahbflu95smrqa1r6yjrs zlrax1nmmw50rta2bnrpcecweehwwwehwwwnmyxywowvnrfzuhrvfffbrdwqtuztuzlzzlzzfdffdffdffffdfffffffpz3u0utlpzkkkkk1ostjwwtrobdjmawtlaurnovtlaurnovtlaurnovbtbxnary13tbxnary13tvgg1cwm1cwxjtwxjtwm1cwm1 c.1cwm1 vm1 vm1 vm1 vmnar oc target =“ _ blank”>以色列攻击可能会驱动伊朗寻求核武器，国际电联首席警告＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiuwFBVV95cUxNVjZ5RmcyNS04SWMxS2xiRC1BYnpEWEJiMmk0RENPemRaNEU0b2dzV0l1TnRocHR5eEwwb2EtSENLdUhyWHhncW4xeE9iS hlrx0rrzhbpeuhmzwdorwtmrelovxbwzzu1zmv4oguwuexsbexecve1vgdyu1pibvhjrejrejfeefil tldchvncfdpx19gakpvmdj3zwtqoxbvltzoz25aqkexzc1tei1soxfqdl8xohf2mwztb0lr？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>伊朗获得IAEA文档的'不好'，表明合作不佳，格罗西说＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters 联合国的核监管机构准备违反非扩散条约＆nbsp; nbsp; haaretz

item.title: 为什么Bamboozled Putin努力为乌克兰的偷袭报仇 - 每日野兽
item.description: <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxQOWxCbXNTZ29JNV82bUJ2ZDFoY0xUTExBZTc3cUx6aVkwVVdIYkc3YVl3ZHBvYlBncFlRczJmQW5iNlM2Mz R3D0SXWU4WVGS4VTHXQNDFUM8ZBWQTQL9VA1HSA2LARU5FTFPIOVJPWDDKSKTMLUTYQ1E5M 1G4UU1TRL92OUVINYYZI1MX0JARKK2VLDJYNDKUVJNNHNJYVF3BETVZKHHNOGJKUQ？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>为什么bombookzled普京正在努力为乌克兰的偷袭攻击报仇＆nbsp; 每日野兽 普京承诺将乌克兰为其空中攻击付费。他剩下了什么？＆nbsp;＆nbsp; cnn 乌克兰的无人机攻击暂时停止在莫斯科，穿越俄罗斯＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters 美国可以从乌克兰的出色操作蜘蛛网＆nbsp; nbsp; 山上href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikgfbvv95cuxncktca0o2eepprmjuyuffsfl6vmzkqvmzkqvmzkqvmwuvpipiwefvbvypiwefvbvy1x0stdhpjcthwr3ptpptzu5pptzu5by0 zya1hudzvhnu9pqjbbn0ptbjl2rnpwmvlptvjynxhft1m5dxvymkfumkfumkfumkfumkswmxjrrzhtb2 owbfppnn2fiqti5tnpitmhyqmhhyqm5youn2sgdas1zgrufited？ target =“ _ blank”>意见| Kyiv勇气的平行＆nbsp;＆nbsp; wsj

item.title: 俄罗斯猛击北约对防空支出电话的“侵略” -Kyiv Post
item.description: 俄罗斯在防空支出上猛击北约'侵略' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmifkfvx3lxte00ni0ni02mmhvck5wunrbcdc5wu0yc0yc0hfegxwc3hkzzzzzzzzuv3cjlqungqung3mvvl ZVFLQTNOM1ZJQ2LVUKSWOG9KWHQ1X0DVZLBWS0ITEXJ2RWZKKF2SMJOVWNAX3BZS2JHVMDTZ1OTUXVMNHJNES1ZZ1ZZ1ZZ1ZZ1D1D1D1QMXZCC19HD21JUQ？ target =“ _ blank”>北约酋长敦促成员在军事上花费更多＆nbsp; 纽约时报 北约需要增加400％的空气和导弹防御，Rutte将在伦敦说＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijafbvv95cuxoluxsz25nmefzuef2tkntbxjjjjjjjjjjjjvzvzvz3vz3vwwounis2mxrjljljljlznurgeu1vtkh5llt Zlmfr4M2FXAETFTVMXDDHZSJQWM3JDCHVYBLKYWMFZZUVMNZZC00RE9VVY1IVMTBD1RRY1I4WKI0VXDISGNNNNN0JUCLPRBBBBBBB3JSBXHRQ2UZUZUEM2QKKEA？秘书长＆nbsp; nbsp; nbsp; 守护者北约首领敦促提高欧洲国防支出的四倍，＆nbsp; nbsp; nbc News
